issue.title: www.youtube.com

labels.name: T: Anti Adblock Script
labels.description: The site detects ad blocking

labels.name: A: Cannot reproduce
labels.description: Filters devs cannot reproduce this issue

labels.name: NSFW
labels.description: Nudes and porn sites

issue.body:
# ATTENTION

> [!NOTE]  
> YouTube changes their detection scripts regularly. That means that sometime you can face the detection message.
> If all the following instructions do not work, please **email filters@adguard.com** or wait until any update is available. 

> [!CAUTION] 
> Please do not use another adblocker in the same time because using another adblocker can delay/lags the YouTube loading (e.g., AdBlock Plus and AdBlock)[^1] OR interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.

> [!CAUTION] 
> Please do not use an userscript related to the bypassing YouTube detection message like [TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing](https://github.com/TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing).
> Recently, YouTube anti-adblock script added infinite dummy advertisements to try to neutralize the userscript. ( [TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing#264](https://github.com/TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing/issues/264) )

> [!WARNING]
> Please check that there no another web browser extension that has adblocking feature is enabled on your web browser. It can interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.

> [!IMPORTANT]  
> Saving memory feature of your web browser or sleep feature of your operating system can interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.
> In this case, please re-enable AdGuard's filtering by toggling the protection toggle.
> Following the instructions can be needed.

### The instructions
1. Force to update the filters by clicking the reload button in AdGuard Browser Extension/AdGuard mobile or update tray menu in your system tray. [^2]
2. Reload the YouTube webpage without cache by pressing <kbd>Ctrl</kbd> + <kbd>Shift</kbd> + <kbd>R</kbd> [^3].
3. Clear cache, cookies and site data of your web browser.
4. Re-open your web browser completely (checking your system monitor[^4] will be better).

[^1]: https://gitlab.com/adblockinc/ext/adblockplus/adblockplusui/-/issues/1576
[^2]: [AdGuard for Windows](https://adguard.com/kb/adguard-for-windows/overview/#tray-menu); [AdGuard for Mac](https://adguard.com/kb/adguard-for-mac/overview/#updates-check); 
[^3]: On macOS, <kbd>Command</kbd> + <kbd>Shift</kbd> + <kbd>R</kbd>
[^4]: Task Manager on Windows, System Monitor on GNOME Shell, KDE System Guard on KDE Plasma or Activity Monitor on macOS.

# ATTENTION

> [!NOTE]  
> YouTube changes their detection scripts regularly. That means that sometime you can face the detection message.
> If all the following instructions do not work, please **email filters@adguard.com** or wait until any update is available. 

> [!CAUTION] 
> Please do not use another adblocker in the same time because using another adblocker can delay/lags the YouTube loading (e.g., AdBlock Plus and AdBlock)[^1] OR interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.

> [!CAUTION] 
> Please do not use an userscript related to the bypassing YouTube detection message like [TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing](https://github.com/TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing).
> Recently, YouTube anti-adblock script added infinite dummy advertisements to try to neutralize the userscript. ( [TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing#264](https://github.com/TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing/issues/264) )

> [!WARNING]
> Please check that there no another web browser extension that has adblocking feature is enabled on your web browser. It can interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.

> [!IMPORTANT]  
> Saving memory feature of your web browser or sleep feature of your operating system can interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.
> In this case, please re-enable AdGuard's filtering by toggling the protection toggle.
> Following the instructions can be needed.

### The instructions
1. Force to update the filters by clicking the reload button in AdGuard Browser Extension/AdGuard mobile or update tray menu in your system tray. [^2]
2. Reload the YouTube webpage without cache by pressing <kbd>Ctrl</kbd> + <kbd>Shift</kbd> + <kbd>R</kbd> [^3].
3. Clear cache, cookies and site data of your web browser.
4. Re-open your web browser completely (checking your system monitor[^4] will be better).

[^1]: https://gitlab.com/adblockinc/ext/adblockplus/adblockplusui/-/issues/1576
[^2]: [AdGuard for Windows](https://adguard.com/kb/adguard-for-windows/overview/#tray-menu); [AdGuard for Mac](https://adguard.com/kb/adguard-for-mac/overview/#updates-check); 
[^3]: On macOS, <kbd>Command</kbd> + <kbd>Shift</kbd> + <kbd>R</kbd>
[^4]: Task Manager on Windows, System Monitor on GNOME Shell, KDE System Guard on KDE Plasma or Activity Monitor on macOS.

comment.body: FF Focus/Klar doesn't respect user certificates, unlike other browsers, so it can't be filtered over HTTPS, in normal FF filtering works, you just need to set permission to use user certificates https://adguard.com/kb/adguard-for-android/solving-problems/firefox-certificates/

pull_request.title: Bump husky from 9.0.7 to 9.0.10
pull_request.body:
Bumps [husky](https://github.com/typicode/husky) from 9.0.7 to 9.0.10.
Release notes

Sourced from husky's releases.

v9.0.10

  • fix: rename index.d.ts to index.d.mts by @​mrkjdy in typicode/husky#1379

v9.0.9

  • refactor: rename files by @​typicode in typicode/husky#1378

v9.0.8

  • docs: update index.md by @​khaledYS in typicode/husky#1369
  • Fix tab detection on install command by @​glensc in typicode/husky#1376
  • refactor: reduce file size by @​typicode in typicode/husky#1377
Commits
  • c042d9b 9.0.10
  • e529368 fix: rename index.d.ts to index.d.mts (#1379)
  • 6219cac 9.0.9
  • d8377fe refactor: rename files (#1378)
  • 211b80a 9.0.8
  • a5a45fc refactor: reduce file size (#1377)
  • d091328 fix: tab detection on install command (#1376)
  • 798f1ad docs: update list
  • b98985d test: expect init to exit with 0
  • 3e13656 docs: fix links
  • Additional commits viewable in compare view

[![Dependabot compatibility score](https://dependabot-badges.githubapp.com/badges/compatibility_score?dependency-name=husky&package-manager=npm_and_yarn&previous-version=9.0.7&new-version=9.0.10)](https://docs.github.com/en/github/managing-security-vulnerabilities/about-dependabot-security-updates#about-compatibility-scores) Dependabot will resolve any conflicts with this PR as long as you don't alter it yourself. You can also trigger a rebase manually by commenting `@dependabot rebase`. [//]: # (dependabot-automerge-start) [//]: # (dependabot-automerge-end) ---
Dependabot commands and options
You can trigger Dependabot actions by commenting on this PR: - `@dependabot rebase` will rebase this PR - `@dependabot recreate` will recreate this PR, overwriting any edits that have been made to it - `@dependabot merge` will merge this PR after your CI passes on it - `@dependabot squash and merge` will squash and merge this PR after your CI passes on it - `@dependabot cancel merge` will cancel a previously requested merge and block automerging - `@dependabot reopen` will reopen this PR if it is closed - `@dependabot close` will close this PR and stop Dependabot recreating it. You can achieve the same result by closing it manually - `@dependabot show ignore conditions` will show all of the ignore conditions of the specified dependency - `@dependabot ignore this major version` will close this PR and stop Dependabot creating any more for this major version (unless you reopen the PR or upgrade to it yourself) - `@dependabot ignore this minor version` will close this PR and stop Dependabot creating any more for this minor version (unless you reopen the PR or upgrade to it yourself) - `@dependabot ignore this dependency` will close this PR and stop Dependabot creating any more for this dependency (unless you reopen the PR or upgrade to it yourself)

issue.title: Proffsmagasinet sites - Subscription options are blocked

labels.name: A: In progress
labels.description: Work on the issue is in progress

issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

Other ad blocker

### AdGuard version

uBlock Origin v1.55.0

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Website or app doesn't work properly

### Which browser(s) do you use?

other (specify in comment below)

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://www.proffsmagasinet.se/
https://www.staypro.dk/
https://www.staypro.fi/
https://www.staypro.no/

### Ad Blocking

AdGuard Base filter

### Privacy

AdGuard Tracking Protection filter

### Social Widgets

_No response_

### Annoyances

_No response_

### Security

_No response_

### Other

_No response_

### DNS filters

_No response_

### Language-specific

_No response_

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

### Affected sites:
```
https://www.proffsmagasinet.se/
https://www.staypro.dk/
https://www.staypro.fi/
https://www.staypro.no/
```

### Issue:
When logged in, and managing your account, the various subscription options are blocked (some of which are enabled by default).

### Screenshots:
**Subscription options blocked:**

![filterissue-staypro-1](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/assets/9382674/512db351-77eb-442f-ab25-d235d35806d6)

**Subscription options allowed:**

![filterissue-staypro-2](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/assets/9382674/3046a6d8-b661-4a6f-983d-a6b8499f22e8)

**uBO's logger:**

![filterissue-staypro-3](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/assets/9382674/ca441e33-c74e-4a55-b2ff-f1bdf3806c95)

### Problem filter:
* **AdGuard Tracking Protection filter**

### Problem rule:
`||exponea.com^$third-party`

### Possible fix:
`@@||cdn.*.exponea.com/production*/consent?$frame,domain=proffsmagasinet.se|staypro.dk|staypro.fi|staypro.no`

### Other problem filters:
* **EasyList - Cookie Notices** / **EasyPrivacy** https://github.com/easylist/easylist/issues/18433/
`##.consent-content`
`||exponea.com^$third-party`

* ~~**uBlock filters - Unbreak** https://github.com/uBlockOrigin/uAssets/issues/22298/~~ **_(FIXED)_**
~~`||exponea.com^$3p`~~

--

### System info:
* OS/version: Windows 10 Pro 22H2 (x64)
* Browser/version: LibreWolf v122.0-2 (x64) [Tracking Protection = Standard]
* Adblock Extension/version: uBlock Origin v1.55.0

### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition

comment.body: Fixed, update should be available soon.

Dependabot commands and options
You can trigger Dependabot actions by commenting on this PR: - `@dependabot rebase` will rebase this PR - `@dependabot recreate` will recreate this PR, overwriting any edits that have been made to it - `@dependabot merge` will merge this PR after your CI passes on it - `@dependabot squash and merge` will squash and merge this PR after your CI passes on it - `@dependabot cancel merge` will cancel a previously requested merge and block automerging - `@dependabot reopen` will reopen this PR if it is closed - `@dependabot close` will close this PR and stop Dependabot recreating it. You can achieve the same result by closing it manually - `@dependabot show ignore conditions` will show all of the ignore conditions of the specified dependency - `@dependabot ignore this major version` will close this PR and stop Dependabot creating any more for this major version (unless you reopen the PR or upgrade to it yourself) - `@dependabot ignore this minor version` will close this PR and stop Dependabot creating any more for this minor version (unless you reopen the PR or upgrade to it yourself) - `@dependabot ignore this dependency` will close this PR and stop Dependabot creating any more for this dependency (unless you reopen the PR or upgrade to it yourself)

comment.body:
It seems that it's caused by `Stealth mode` - `Hide Referrer from third parties` and it's related to this issue - https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardBrowserExtension/issues/2648
It has been fixed in extension version 4.3.x, so you can try to manually update extension, or as a temporary solution disable `Hide Referrer from third parties` option.

issue.title: www.mydealz.de
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Ads) [https://www.mydealz.de](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.mydealz.de) ### Comment > DNS blocking fails regularly when dns request are done several times. I think it happens on several domains (also on Android) but here I can only show on Windows 10 for "mydealz.de" that requests "faye.prod-eks.pepper.com" (some kind of tracking). As you can see it is requested every few seconds, most of the requests are blocked, but it seems that every 4th request is answered from the cache and returns a domain. But I am not totally sure that the requests succeed, because in the network tab of the dev tools of vivaldi, all the requests seem to fail. ### [NSFW] Screenshots

Desktop

AdGuard Base filter

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

Hey,
Simply the syntax on your list here for example:
https://adguardteam.github.io/HostlistsRegistry/assets/filter_12.txt

For those lines starting with column like this:
://ww4.$denyallow=ww4.ikea.com
://ww5.$denyallow=ww5.ikea.com|ww5.msu.ac.zw
://popupblockergold.
://adblock-pro-download.
://142.91.159.
://23.109.150.

And lines starting with dash like this:
-outletcanada.
-norgesalg.com^

Is not documented here https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdGuardHome/wiki/Hosts-Blocklists or here https://adguard.com/kb/general/ad-filtering/create-own-filters/ and cannot be found here https://adblockplus.org/filter-cheatsheet too 

If they are mistaken removes them, if they're some kind of comment use ! as you mention, otherwise if valid add the syntax to the wiki and kb 

### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition

comment.body:
`://domain.` can be used.
`|` = `://` / `protocol://`


> And lines starting with dash like this:
> -outletcanada.
> -norgesalg.com^

AdBlock syntax used here - AdGuard blocks a domain by matched text. HOSTS syntax is not flexible.

I think it happens on several domains (also on Android) but here I can only show on Windows 10 for "mydealz.de" that requests "faye.prod-eks.pepper.com" (some kind of tracking). As you can see it is requested every few seconds, most of the requests are blocked, but it seems that every 4th request is answered from the cache and returns a domain. But I am not totally sure that the requests succeed, because in the network tab of the dev tools of vivaldi, all the requests seem to fail. ### [NSFW] Screenshots

issue.title: m.fmkorea.com
issue.body:
### 필터 업데이트를 하신 후에도 작동이 안된다면, 아래 이메일로 문의해주세요. ### 도움이 필요하시면, [filters@adguard.com](mailto:filters@adguard.com) 으로 문의해주세요. > [!IMPORTANT] > [AdGuard for Android](https://adguard.com/ko/adguard-android/overview.html)인 경우에는 List-KR 필터와 사용하시는 웹 브라우저에 대한 HTTPS 필터링이 활성화되어있는지 확인해주세요. 또한, 캐시, 쿠키 및 사이트 데이터 삭제 또한 도움이 됩니다. _Google Play 스토어에 있는 [AdGuard Content Blocker](https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.adguard.android.contentblocker&hl=ko)로는 차단이 어렵습니다._ > [!IMPORTANT] > 또한, AdGuard 유료 라이선스 없이 AdGuard for iOS를 사용하시는 분들은 점점 광고 차단하기 어려워질 수 있으니, 블랙 프라이데이 할인 중인 유니콘 프로보다 싼 [stacksocial.com](https://www.stacksocial.com/sales/adguard-family-plan-lifetime-subscription)에서 구입하신 뒤에 Safari 고급 보호 및 List-KR 필터를 활성화해주세요. > [!TIP] > AdGuard for Android에서 설정 탭 -> 일반 -> 앱과 필터 업데이트 -> 필터 자동 업데이트 값을 1시간으로 줄일 수 있습니다. --- ### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://m.fmkorea.com](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fm.fmkorea.com) ### Comment > 에펨코리아 홈페이지 광고 차단 우회 생겼습니다. 막아주세용ㅠ Username: `@없음` ### [NSFW] Screenshots

comment.body:
It's not a cookie message, it says about the mailing to your mobile phone, consent to send emails and data transfer to third party services. This is an important functional popup, I don't think it should be blocked. 
You can send the saved page to filters@adguard.com, I can try to make a rule (cannot reproduce after login).

comment.body:
Насколько я вижу, сайт открывается нормально, тоже самое относится к перечисленным сервисам.
Включите русский фильтр, обновите фильтры (подождите около одной минуты), очистите данные браузера, затем откройте сайт.
Если это не поможет, вам следует повторно включить блокировщики контента (веб расширения) в настройках Safari (подождите примерно столько же времени, сколько и при обновлении фильтров).

### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);

- [ ] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [ ] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard for Android

### AdGuard version

3.6.11/54

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Missed ads or ad leftovers

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Chrome

### Which device do you use?

Mobile

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://www.ozon.ru

### Ad Blocking

AdGuard Base filter, AdGuard Mobile Ads filter, EasyList

_No response_

### Other

_No response_

_No response_

### Language-specific

_No response_

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

1. На озоне при открытии сайта лезет реклама, которая зело задолбала, скрывается она спустя пару секунд после открытия сайта, но раздражает дико. Скрывается правилом www.ozon.ru##.tx но на её месте остаётся большой белый прямоугольник, который прыгает туда - сюда. Т.е. надо дорихтовывать ещё правилами или на JS, а тут уже мои полномочия - всё.

comment.body:
Unfortunately, this app is not available in my country (I cannot install it even with VPN connected to India server).

>In starting, I have tried to play video and it's not playing so I disable ADGUARD [...]

Video player often is broken when `imasdk.googleapis.com` is blocked, so please try to add this rule:
```adblock
@@||imasdk.googleapis.com^$app=com.amazon.minitv.android.app
```
clear app cache and then check again.

If issue still occurs, please open AdGuard app, go to `Statistics`, tap on `Recent activity`, `Clear recent activity` (3 dots in top right corner), now please reproduce issue and make screenshot with all requests from this app.

By the way, in some apps ads cannot be blocked.

@@||us1-prod-direct.investigationdiscovery.com/v1/gauth/authorize?brand_id=$stealth=ip

issue.body:
Известно, что эта проблема решается с помощью AdGuard Extra.

Если вы пользуетесь AdGuard на устройствах Windows, Mac или Android, пожалуйста, убедитесь, что AdGuard Extra включена в настройках приложения.

Если вы используете расширение AdGuard для браузера, рекомендуется также установить AdGuard Extra.

* [Установка на браузеры Chrome, Edge или другие, основанные на Chromium](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_chrome_release)
* [Установка на Firefox](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_firefox_release)

labels.name: T: Anti Adblock Script
labels.description: The site detects ad blocking

labels.name: A: Cannot reproduce

labels.name: NSFW
labels.description: Nudes and porn sites

issue.body:
# ATTENTION

> [!NOTE]  
> YouTube changes their detection scripts regularly. That means that sometime you can face the detection message.
> If all the following instructions do not work, please **email filters@adguard.com** or wait until any update is available. 

> [!CAUTION] 
> Please do not use another adblocker in the same time because using another adblocker can delay/lags the YouTube loading (e.g., AdBlock Plus and AdBlock)[^1] OR interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.

> [!CAUTION] 
> Please do not use an userscript related to the bypassing YouTube detection message like [TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing](https://github.com/TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing).
> Recently, YouTube anti-adblock script added infinite dummy advertisements to try to neutralize the userscript. ( [TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing#264](https://github.com/TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing/issues/264) )

> [!WARNING]
> Please check that there no another web browser extension that has adblocking feature is enabled on your web browser. It can interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.

> [!IMPORTANT]  
> Saving memory feature of your web browser or sleep feature of your operating system can interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.
> In this case, please re-enable AdGuard's filtering by toggling the protection toggle.
> Following the instructions can be needed.

### The instructions
1. Force to update the filters by clicking the reload button in AdGuard Browser Extension/AdGuard mobile or update tray menu in your system tray. [^2]
2. Reload the YouTube webpage without cache by pressing <kbd>Ctrl</kbd> + <kbd>Shift</kbd> + <kbd>R</kbd> [^3].
3. Clear cache, cookies and site data of your web browser.
4. Re-open your web browser completely (checking your system monitor[^4] will be better).

[^1]: https://gitlab.com/adblockinc/ext/adblockplus/adblockplusui/-/issues/1576
[^2]: [AdGuard for Windows](https://adguard.com/kb/adguard-for-windows/overview/#tray-menu); [AdGuard for Mac](https://adguard.com/kb/adguard-for-mac/overview/#updates-check); 
[^3]: On macOS, <kbd>Command</kbd> + <kbd>Shift</kbd> + <kbd>R</kbd>
[^4]: Task Manager on Windows, System Monitor on GNOME Shell, KDE System Guard on KDE Plasma or Activity Monitor on macOS.

1. Force to update the filters by clicking the reload button in AdGuard Browser Extension/AdGuard mobile or update tray menu in your system tray. [^2]
2. Reload the YouTube webpage without cache by pressing <kbd>Ctrl</kbd> + <kbd>Shift</kbd> + <kbd>R</kbd> [^3].
3. Clear cache, cookies and site data of your web browser.
4. Re-open your web browser completely (checking your system monitor[^4] will be better).

[^1]: https://gitlab.com/adblockinc/ext/adblockplus/adblockplusui/-/issues/1576
[^2]: [AdGuard for Windows](https://adguard.com/kb/adguard-for-windows/overview/#tray-menu); [AdGuard for Mac](https://adguard.com/kb/adguard-for-mac/overview/#updates-check); 
[^3]: On macOS, <kbd>Command</kbd> + <kbd>Shift</kbd> + <kbd>R</kbd>
[^4]: Task Manager on Windows, System Monitor on GNOME Shell, KDE System Guard on KDE Plasma or Activity Monitor on macOS.

labels.description: The site detects ad blocking

labels.name: NSFW

issue.body:
# ATTENTION

> [!NOTE]  
> YouTube changes their detection scripts regularly. That means that sometime you can face the detection message.
> If all the following instructions do not work, please **email filters@adguard.com** or wait until any update is available. 

> [!CAUTION] 
> Please do not use another adblocker in the same time because using another adblocker can delay/lags the YouTube loading (e.g., AdBlock Plus and AdBlock)[^1] OR interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.

> [!CAUTION] 
> Please do not use an userscript related to the bypassing YouTube detection message like [TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing](https://github.com/TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing).
> Recently, YouTube anti-adblock script added infinite dummy advertisements to try to neutralize the userscript. ( [TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing#264](https://github.com/TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing/issues/264) )

> [!WARNING]
> Please check that there no another web browser extension that has adblocking feature is enabled on your web browser. It can interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.

> [!IMPORTANT]  
> Saving memory feature of your web browser or sleep feature of your operating system can interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.
> In this case, please re-enable AdGuard's filtering by toggling the protection toggle.
> Following the instructions can be needed.

### The instructions
1. Force to update the filters by clicking the reload button in AdGuard Browser Extension/AdGuard mobile or update tray menu in your system tray. [^2]
2. Reload the YouTube webpage without cache by pressing <kbd>Ctrl</kbd> + <kbd>Shift</kbd> + <kbd>R</kbd> [^3].
3. Clear cache, cookies and site data of your web browser.
4. Re-open your web browser completely (checking your system monitor[^4] will be better).

[^1]: https://gitlab.com/adblockinc/ext/adblockplus/adblockplusui/-/issues/1576
[^2]: [AdGuard for Windows](https://adguard.com/kb/adguard-for-windows/overview/#tray-menu); [AdGuard for Mac](https://adguard.com/kb/adguard-for-mac/overview/#updates-check); 
[^3]: On macOS, <kbd>Command</kbd> + <kbd>Shift</kbd> + <kbd>R</kbd>
[^4]: Task Manager on Windows, System Monitor on GNOME Shell, KDE System Guard on KDE Plasma or Activity Monitor on macOS.
